fields.description: Specifies the caching requirements. Possible values are: **None,** **ReadOnly,** **ReadWrite.** The defaulting behavior is: **None for Standard storage. ReadOnly for Premium storage.**
fields.name: Caching

fields.description: Specifies whether data disk should be deleted or detached upon VM deletion. Possible values are: **Delete.** If this value is used, the data disk is deleted when VM is deleted. **Detach.** If this value is used, the data disk is retained after VM is deleted. The default value is set to **Detach**.
fields.name: DeleteOption

fields.description: Specifies the customer managed disk encryption set resource id for the managed disk.
fields.name: DiskEncryptionSet

fields.description: ID of the managed data disk.
fields.name: DiskId

fields.description: The logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data disk attached to a VM. If not specified, lun would be auto assigned.
fields.name: Lun

fields.description: Specifies whether writeAccelerator should be enabled or disabled on the disk.
fields.name: WriteAcceleratorEnabled
